snippet.title: American McGee's Alice - Trailer [HQ]
snippet.description:
"A strangely familiar, yet utterly wicked tale."

Shortly after the events of "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland" and "Through the Looking Glass and What Alice Found There" is set the story of "Alice" by American McGee. Her house is mysteriously set alight, and Alice is the only survivor. With severe survivors guilt and claiming it was all her fault, she, a year later, is sent to Rutledge Asylum, where she has hallucination of her "Wonderland".

The Queen of Hearts is in power. Friend or Foe? Toy or Weapon?

Time is running out.

Composer : Chris Vrenna
Publisher : Electronic Arts
Developers : Rogue Entertainment
Release Dates : 06 October 2000 (USA) - 15 December 2000 (EUR)
Platform : PC

Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/AmericanMcGeesAlice
Follow us on Tumblr: http://OfficialAliceLiddell.tumblr.com

Please note we do not claim any of the soundtrack or images used in this video. This has only been placed here for public entertainment of the Alice fan community.
